#22

Weird, wonder what's causing the friction.

Because at that age, it's more about family and companionship and less about romance and sex. And they clearly share a ton of values, especially considering they're continuing to work on the foundation.

If I had to guess, Bill is probably just tirelessly and obsessively focused on the foundation and Melinda wants to retire and travel or something. Bill was OCD at Microsoft, that's probably still true. For example, in the early days Bill would monitor all license plates and times people arrived/exited and internally created a shit list for his staff...which is absolutely insane.
